issues.info: Report issues to the issue tracker on GitHub or to yedel on discord

include-rated-levels.name: Include Rated Levels
include-rated-levels.description: Whether to include rated levels when calculating true difficulties.

include-unrated-levels.name: Include Unrated Levels
include-unrated-levels.description: Whether to include unrated levels when calculating true difficulties.

include-na-levels.name: Include NA levels
include-na-levels.description: Whether to include NA levels (as difficulty 0) when calculating true difficulties.
